thread.title: Bruce Lee 7 Days (First Week) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up
thread.title_full: Bruce Lee 7 Days (First Week) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up

title: Bruce Lee 7 Days (First Week) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Friday, October 23, 2015, 19:36 [IST] 
Ram Charan 's Bruce Lee The Fighter , which released among huge expectations, disappointed audience largely and has received a lot of criticism from the analysts for its 'beaten to death' stuff. Bruce Lee - The Fighter (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
However, the film has been stable at the box office, which might make it an average fare after the full run and on the other hand, Dusshera holidays might add up a decent amount of raise in its collections. 
But, we can already say Bruce Lee is a disaster in the overseas as it only collected around $700K in USA and 1 Million mark appears tough for the actor to pull off. 
In fact Ram Charan is the only star hero in Tollywood, who did not score a million at the US box office till now, which is making mega fans worry more. 
Nevertheless, Bruce Lee has collected a share of 27.45 Cr in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana after its first week of release and continuing to do a decent business. 
Check out the area-wise breakup of Bruce Lee 7 days box office collections in the slides below. Bruce Lee 7 Days (First Week) Box Office Collections 1/9 Nizam 
Bruce Lee The Fighter starring Ram Charan, Rakul, directed by Sreenu Vaitla collected a share of 7.80 Cr in Nizam after 7 days of release. The film also features Chiranjeevi in a cameo role. Bruce Lee 7 Days (First Week) Box Office Collections 2/9 Ceeded 
Bruce Lee The Fighter, directed by Sreenu Vaitla collected a share of 5.48 Cr in Ceeded. Ram Charan holds a strong fan base in the area. Bruce Lee 7 Days (First Week) Box Office Collections 3/9 Vizag 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 3.45 Cr in Vizag after 7 days of release. Vizag has been on the strongest revenue generating place for the mega hero films. Bruce Lee 7 Days (First Week) Box Office Collections 4/9 Nellore 
Bruce Lee The Fighter collected a share of 1.37 Cr in Nellore after 7 days of release. The film deals about brother and sister sentiment. Bruce Lee 7 Days (First Week) Box Office Collections 5/9 Krishna 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 1.78 Cr in Krishna after 7 days of release. The film's songs were already topping the charts. Bruce Lee 7 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 6/9 Guntur 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 2.96 Cr in Guntur after 7 days of release. Comedy scenes between Rakul and Charan worked out well. 
Bruce Lee 7 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 7/9 East 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 2.53 Cr in East Godavari after 7 days of release. Charan sported Lungi for the first time in Bruce Lee title song. Bruce Lee 7 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 8/9 West 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 2.08 Cr in West Godavari after 7 days of release. Chiranjeevi's cameo did not really help much for the film's box office.
